firstPara: The references are for the Department of State and for your summer camp. Your 2 referees need to have known you for over 6 months, can't be a relative and should be one of the following:
secondPara: When you request your reference, it will send an email each of your 2 chosen referees. Make sure you let them know to keep an eye out for it!
thirdPara: If the status of your reference request does not change to 'completed' within 10 days, please delete the request and try again.
